column4: Hey. I am wondering about a TV episode of some show, but i can't find on google if i describe what I remember. I remember they were in a school and they had to get to an eye doctor, the eye doctor hypnotized them. Also, there was a magic glasses and if you put them on you get strange hints from texts, like they morph into other text. The text was on a chocolate
Does anybody know what I am describing?
It actually gave me fear of the eye doctor long ago :P
